resources.string: Disable geotagging of your camera application to prevent interference
Show a popup with a thumbnail and the reverse geocoded address (if available) after geotagging a photo
Prefer less accurate locations with altitude information over more accurate locations without altitude information
Stop locating after a location with the selected accuracy or better has been acquired
Always stop locating after the selected time
Tap to open the Android location settings
